Package

allegro

Initializers

🆕

Methods

⏳ 🖱 ⌨ ⏲

Class 🗃

🗃 represents an event queue. An 🗃 instance holds events that have been generated by event sources that are registered with the queue. Events are stored in the order they are generated. Access is in a strictly FIFO (first-in-first-out) order.

Initializers

🆕

🐈 🆕

Creates a new, empty event queue.

Methods

⏳

🐖 ⏳ ➡️ 🎉

Waits for an event and returns it.

🖱

🐖 🖱 ➡️ ✨

Registers the mouse as an event source.

⌨

🐖 ⌨ ➡️ ✨

Registers the keyboard as an event source.

⏲

🐖 ⏲ timer ⏲ ➡️ ✨

Registers a ⏲ instance as an event source.
